alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 12:02AM PST until February 25 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Up to 1 foot of snow accumulation between 1,000 feet and 4,000 feet and 1 to 2 feet of snow accumulation above 4,000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Kern River Valley, Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. Interstate 5 and Highway 58 over the passes could be shut down for prolonged periods of time.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
